entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning then changing to rain late this afternoon. Fog patches developing late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
